ygData.subject: skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: also another thing. I recently found a webpage (lost it) that mentioned that Tinkering and one other tradeskills is possible to reach over 200 cap even if you
ygData.messageBody:
also another thing. I recently found a webpage (lost it) that
mentioned that Tinkering and one other tradeskills is possible to
reach over 200 cap even if you have mastered any of the other more
common tradeskills like, tailoring, baking or fishing. Is that true?
And if so, what other tradeskill other than Tinkering is it possible
with?

Stina.
This is the last time I will not bookmark a page just because I have
a similar page bookmarked about the same subject.
